suncertify.db
Class LockableRecord

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.LockableRecord

final class LockableRecord
extends java.lang.Object

A record and its lock. Note that this class is mutable - the owner field becomes set to the owner of the lock. The record may also be changed to another record. Thread safety: this class is thread safe.

Constructor Summary

          Create a LockableRecord containing the given Record.

Method Detail

getRecord

Record getRecord()
Get the Record contained.

Returns:
the Record

setRecord

void setRecord(Record newRecord)
Set the record to the given record. It is assumed that the caller has the right to do this.

Parameters:
newRecord - the new record

lock

void lock(java.lang.Object newOwner)
Lock the record and set the owner to the new owner. If the lock is not available then the current thread becomes disabled for thread scheduling purposes and lies dormant until the lock has been acquired.

Parameters:
newOwner - the new owner of the lock

unlock

void unlock(java.lang.Object currentOwner)
Unlock the record and reset the owner to null. If the lock is not owned by the given owner, this method does nothing.

Parameters:
currentOwner - the current lock owner

getOwner

java.lang.Object getOwner()
Get the current lock owner.

Returns:
the lock owner
